data.title: Epic Systems
data.meta_description: The 1,100-acre headquarters of medical-software giant Epic Systems is located in the rolling farm country on Westside of Verona and is a must-see for both visitors and locals. Impressive and unique both inside and out, you will find one day is not enough time to explore the huge expanse of fantastical buildings and the massive collection of art on the campus. As of 2022, Epicâ€™s Verona campus encompasses 22 office buildings, two large food service buildings, a training center with 65 training rooms and a 5,800-seat auditorium, and the Deep Space auditorium that seats 11,400. SELF-GUIDED TOURS AVAILABLE Sat–Sun10AM–3PM Mon–Fri2:30PM–5PM *Epic is closed for tours on holidays and special events. We recommend calling ahead to verify tour availability.
